forgot_password_main_text: We will send you a code to reset your password. Please enter your email where you created a Traderlands account to receive the code.
register_user_disclaimer_text: By clicking the Register button, you accept that you have read, and confirm
register_email_input_error_text: This email has already been registered.
register_consent_text: In order to be informed about the campaigns, I accept the processing of my personal data and receiving electronic messages.
register_ref_code_warning_text: Exclusive Access : You can access the services with only valid referral code.
register_password_input_error_text:
*Password should contain uppercase and lowercase letters.
*Password should contain letters and numbers.
*Password should contain special characters.
*Minimum length of the password (the default value is 8).
register_password_input_error_text_1: A lowercase letter, an uppercase letter
login_verification_error_otp_codes_not_f: You should fill the OTP codes before moving on.
